Name: Gestalt Zero
Description:
Gestalt Project Subject Zero. Can use theThe Way of Khala to harness the power of wind, destroying all enemies in his way.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip:
Exhaust all Psionic Surge stacks, instantly move behind the target and quickly perform 5 slashes, dealing 100 damage per slash.

Leave a Psionic Tornado in place.
Root.Name: Storm Breath

Root.Tooltip:
Instantly move behind the target and gain a Psionic Surge effect.

When Psionic Surge stack to 2, replace the ability with Storm Breath : Increase release range to 20, instantly move behind the target and quickly perform 5 slashes and leave a 5 seconds Psionic Tornado in place.

Psionic Surge: Increase energy gaining efficiency by 200%. Stack up to 2 times.
Root.Name: Shadow of the Storm

Root.Tooltip:
Become invulunerable for 3 seconds, leaving a Psionic Tornado in place.

Reactivate to reset the cooldown of Shadow of the Storm.
Root.Name: Storm Shelter

Root.Tooltip:
Order all Psionic Tornado within 50 yards to move to Zero's current position at high speed.

When using Hurricane Echo, clear all energy and 10% of it will be recorded. All Psionic Tornado recalled will gain Hurricane Echo ability in 5 seconds.

Hurriance Echo: Units touched by Psionic Tornado will frequently generate wind brust, dealing recorded damage to nearby enemy units.
Root.Name: Hurricane Echo

Root.Tooltip:
Order Zero charge to the last generated Psionic Tornado's position, dealing 50 damage to enemy units in the path.

Also the Psionic Tornado will move to Zero's starting postion at high speed.
Root.Name: Wind Blast

Root.Tooltip:
Release a Psionic Tornado to the target location, causing it to move and stay to the end.

When reactive Wind Blast, Zero quickly step to Psionic Tornado's position, dealing 50 damage to all enemy units in the path and causing this Psionic Tornado move to Zero's starting position at high speed.
Root.Name: Wind Blast

Root.Tooltip:
Form a huge Bursting Storm moving toward the target direction after a 1 second charge. Bursting Storm will continuously pull all enemy units and deal 10 damage per 0.1 seconds.

When Bursting Storm lasts, Zero use abilities will no longer consume energy and make Zero's ability almost have no cooldown.
Root.Name: Ougi - Bursting Storm

Root.Tooltip:
Gestalt Zero has 100 maximum energy. He will restore his shield and energy at 1000% of the target's supply amount when performing an attack.

Increase attack speed and movement speed by 2% and regen rate by 20% when performing an attack. Stack up to 15 times. Last 25 seconds.
Each Psionic Tornado nearby will provide 1 stack of 150% of this effect.
Root.Name: The Way of Khala Â· Wind Rover

Root.Tooltip:
Gestalt Zero can use psionic energy to communicate with the flowing winds in nature.

Psionic Tornado created by Zero has a weak suction, dealing 1 damage to enemy units it touches per 0.2 seconds.

When Zero controls Psionic Tornado to move at high speed, the susction will increase and deal 5 damage to enemy units it touches per 0.1 seconds.
Root.Name: The Way of Khala Â· Wind Rider

Behaviors.Tooltip: A "Yasuo" is warping into the battlefield.
Behaviors.Name: Warping in
